resources.string:
Try to guess each letter of the word within your limited amount of guesses.
If that letter is in the word the letter will appear on the blackboard.If the letter is not in the word then a body part is added to the gallows (head, body, left arm, right arm, left leg, right leg).
You must continue guessing letters until you can either solve the word or all six body parts are on the gallows.

TO WIN: The guesser wins if they guess the word before the person is hung.
